message:
> So I have a lose Pokemon Sapphire with a new battery it works fine, I'd like to possibly trade it for one of the Pokemon DS games. Ether Black, Platinum or Soul Silver. I'm just looking for a working English cartridge
<@313113217977155584> <:WTS:708489317168971778>
[EU] I've got a nice yellow GBP for sale, IPS V2 with touch controls, new membranes, new caps, glass lens. 120 EUR.

<:WTT:711683426469544006> <:WTS:708489317168971778>  [USA] Willing to haggle 
Selling these, and willing to take some things in trade:
- $40 Gameboy Color (board revision 04)
- $70 AGS-101 (no charger)
- $120 PS Vita PCH-1001 (yes charger)

Taking these as trade value:
- $15 NES Metroid (not the GBA port, the actual NES one)
- $20 NES Kirby's Adventure (not the GBA port, the actual NES one)
- $20 NES Final Fantasy (not the GBA port, the actual NES one)
<:WTS:708489317168971778> have a copy of MGS for GBC (with damaged label). I know it's popular, if you want dibs please contact me! We'll find a reasonable price.
<:WTT:711683426469544006> either my modded yellow gbc or ips modded dmg for a modded GBA.
<:WTB:708489317357584415> GBA SP motherboard, working

<:WTT:711683426469544006>  Gameboy light <:mgl:512765989985714196> and gameboy color <:cgb:510986381535739907>  and zelda minish cap for 1 or more of the following,  pokemon red, gold, crystal, or any of the advance ones (boot too be added either way to make it fair) conus only

<:WTB:708489317357584415> I'm looking to buy an older (4-5 years old max) android phone for cheap. Doesn't have to be in perfect shape. DM me if you have something I might want! Must ship to USA.

:wtb: Anyone here potentially have some spare 3DS game cases with the original cover art/inserts still about?  I have some lone games I'd like to get right.

<:WTS:708489317168971778> CircleBoy boards! At least 2 available at this time. This is a simple circuit board that converts a 3DS circle pad analog stick into signals that replace the dpad for the GBA (and GBC). Installation gallery - https://imgur.com/a/vMOLDO8, More Info/Files - https://github.com/orangeglo/CircleBoy

**$15** shipped in the US! Assembled and tested board only, no circle pad is included.
